dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#35)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[Private]
Chicago, Illinois 60607
January 28, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,


1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
http://www.seologic.com/placement/website-web-site-promotion.php

Search Query 1: "Search engines are carefully tuned information management systems"
http://www.google.com/search?q=%22Search+engines+are++tuned+inforniation+management+systems%22&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8oe=UTF-8&filter=0

Search Query 2: "not a process of manipulation or"
http://www.google.com/search?q=%22not+a+process+of+manipulation+or%22&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&filter=0

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.ivokawebdesign.com/search_engine_optimization.html

2.	My Contact Information: [Private]@internetmadeeasy.com

3.	Infringer's Contact Information:
Ivoka Design
Phone: XXX.XXX.XXXX
E-mail: [PRIVATE]@ivokadesign.com

4.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages, is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely

[Private], CEO Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
p.XXX.XXX.XXX
[Private]@internetmadeeasy.com
